Reviews.Title: composite jack shot
Reviews.Author: JH1969MO
Reviews.Content: After one year, the AV/Composite/Component jack used to hook up our old NES game system quit.  However, the game system still works on other TVs.  Everything else works on this TV except the AV/Composite/Component jack no longer recognizes the game system....screen says: "no input".  Weird!  Good thing this TV has a two year warrenty.

Reviews.Title: Product doesn't work. Company states "too bad"
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv from best buy because it had great reviews and was affordable priced. Big mistake. The tv does not work. It will power on but there is no picture or sound. This was an issue from the day I bought it. I have a warranty but the company states that this known issue is not covered so I will have to either pay to have it fixed or buy another tv. What kind of company doesn't honor their warranty or back their product?

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: waxy ".....and stuff"
Reviews.Content: Very good tv for the price. the only problem I have is sometimes the remote won't work.But after a while it'll start working again.

Reviews.Title: Crap!
Reviews.Author: Haley
Reviews.Content: Bought this and after a few months the thing crapped out on me!  It took me about 6 weeks to get a new one with the warranty, and I had to jump through several hoops with the manufacturer to get them to make good on their warranty, and it has this fuzzy spot in the corner that won't go away.  I'm not even going to bother trying to get it replaced again.  Not worth the hassle. I asked for a good brand TV for Christmas.  Don't buy this piece of crap unless you want a really big paper weight.

Reviews.Title: South Korean POS
Reviews.Author: tdma_tester
Reviews.Content: The only thing worse than the no name Chinese brand TVs that entered the US market are the South Korean, Insignia being one of them. Have had a DVD/VCR combo that is a total malfunction POS for Insignia. The TV, a plasma, got about five years into its service life before experiencing what is probably a faulty capacitor in its power supply- the the unit turns right back off after turning it on. Performance is also just so so. Power hungry, and ghost images form very quickly with a still screen. It also makes a high pitched sound which is annoying if you are using as a monitor with no sound.

Reviews.Title: Installed in moterhome.
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: I just installed it s week ago, we have using all week, great picture and reception.Purchased @ Wallmart $235. otd.
